text: Veruyushchiye! Ne teryayte blagogoveniya k pamyatnikam Bozhiim, k zapretnomu mesyatsu, k zhertvennym zhivotnym i ukrasheniyam na ikh sheyakh, k stremyashchimsya k zapretnomu domu, s zhelaniyem shchedrot i blagovoleniya ot Gospoda svoyego. Kogda zhe vy, po sovershenii prazdnika, pereydote v obyknovennoye sostoyaniye, togda okhot'tes' dlya lova. Nenavist' kakikh libo lyudey, ne dopuskavshikh vas k zapretnoy mecheti, ne dolzhna vozbuzhdat' vas k nespravedlivym postupkam. Pomogayte drug drugu v dobre i blagochestii, no ne pomogayte drug drugu vo zle i vrazhde; boytes' Boga, potomu chto Bog strog v nakazanii
